definition: lost in thought, to go away or leave
details:
adjective
- lost in thought
= synonyms: absentminded, abstracted, scatty
- nonexistent
= example: nonexistent
= synonyms: lacking, missing, wanting
- not being in a specified place
verb
- to go away or leave
= example: to go away or leave
= synonyms: remove, quit, depart, take leave
